1. $F^{-1}(u) = b(1 - u)^{-1/a}$

2. 

```{r}
my_rpareto <- function(n, a, b){
  u <- runif(n)
  x <- b*(1 - u)^{-1/a}
  return(x)
}

x <- my_rpareto(100, 5, 0.5)
grid_pts <- seq(0, 2, 0.01)

plot(grid_pts, ecdf(x)(grid_pts), type="l", xlab="x", ylab="F(x)")
lines(grid_pts, 1 - (0.5/grid_pts)^5, col="blue")
```
